data.title: Collection Tracker
data.description: Helps user to keep track on packs progess, suggesting the packs that will most probably contain missing cards. Report bugs and issues on the Project's Issues page.
data.author: Hearthsim

data.title: Export to Hearthpwn
data.description: Export the selected deck to Hearthpwn or a TXT file. Use by selecting a deck and going to the plugins menu.
data.author: Judge2020

data.title: Arena Helper
data.description: Arena Helper is a plugin for Hearthstone Deck Tracker that helps drafting Hearthstone arena decks by showing an overlay with card values from a tier list. The plugin tries to visually detect the arena heroes and card choices. Detected cards are displayed alongside the value of the card, that is specified in The Lightforge: Hearthstone Arena Tier List. The created deck can be saved to Hearthstone Deck Tracker.
data.author: Rembound

data.title: Graveyard tracker
data.description: Displays minions that have died this game. Includes specialized displays: deathrattle minions for N'Zoth decks, resurect chance for Resurect Priest, and Murloc minions with a damage calculator for Anyfin Can Happen.
data.author: RedHatter

data.title: End Game
data.description: Adds extra functionality to the built-in end of game note window. Including, victory/defeat screenshots and opponent deck archetypes.
data.author: andburn

data.title: Stats converter
data.description: Import and export game statistics in different formats
data.author: andburn

data.title: Hearth Arena Uploader
data.description: Plugin for uploading your arena runs to Hearth Arena (http://heartharena.com). Suggestions and bug reports can be sent to https://github.com/riQQ/Hearth-Arena-Uploader.
data.author: riQQ

data.title: Trouble at the mill
data.description: Displays the number of card draws until each player dies from fatigue.
data.author: realchriscasey

data.title: Hearthstone Treasury
data.description: Gold tracking plugin for Hearthstone Deck Tracker.
data.author: arkein
